code: import axios from"axios";var baseUrl="api/persons";var getAll=function getAll(){var promise=axios.get(baseUrl);return promise.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var create=function create(person){var promise=axios.post(baseUrl,person);return promise.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var remove=function remove(id){var promise=axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id));return promise.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var replace=function replace(person){var promise=axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(person.id),person);return promise.then(function(response){return response.data;});};export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,remove:remove,replace:replace};
